comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. overlay onSingleTapUp 2. projection.fromPixels(event.getX(), event.getY()) 3. zoom level 0 - 9 What is the expected output? What do you see instead? wrong geographic position What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Using the latest code from SVN 3.0.2
r881 updated the Geodetic algorithms we use. Can you please update to the latest trunk and retest and report the results?
method is working properly, the issue can be closed
